item.title: BZOJ 1635: [Usaco2007 Jan]Tallest Cow 最高的牛 (差分序列（前缀和的逆）)
item.description: 1635: [Usaco2007 Jan]Tallest Cow 最高的牛 Time Limit: 5 Sec Memory Limit: 64 MB Submit: 472 Solved: 278 [Submit][Status][Discuss] Description FJ’s N (1 <= N <= 10,000) cows conveniently indexed 1..N are standing in a line. Each cow has a positive integer height (which is a bit of secret). You are told only the height H (1 <= H <= 1,000,000) of the tallest cow along with the
